channel.title: Liberty Justice and the Persuit of Pizza
channel.itunes:subtitle: Where even the declaration of independence cannot escape our rambley wrath.

item.title: Episode 32. The Ghost of Christmas Kirk!
item.description: Once upon a time, in a town not far from you, an average teenager is being horribly haunter by a bewildered ghost, who may or may not actually BE a ghost. Join us in our existential nightmare... "Isn't it 6 monthes too late to be the ghost of Christmas anything?" -Tom http://www.youtube.com/user/LibJusPiz00Cast/ Party!

item.title: Episode 20, 2.0!
item.description: Religion! Deli's! Rumblo's return! Hear the rantings and possibly even ravings of our podcast. We talk about all of the above. Also, Happy Birthday to Jan. *Party whistle* Also, We know we spelled "Prestige" wrong on the cover art. Just go with it. links: http://www.cracked.com/tasersmack/ http://www.thew00tman.webs.com/ Also, look us up on Facebook!

item.title: Episode 19, I WAS IN NAM!
item.description: We are having flashbacks, backflashes and flack bashes over here today. Many crazy moustaches and babysitting happening. We hope you enjoy this podcast's madness, and mispreperations. And we are now on facebook! Liberty, Justice and the Persuit of pizza! look for us! ~LInks~ Website: http://www.thew00tman.webs.com/ Cracked: http://www.cracked.com/members/das_w00tman http://www.cracked.com/members/tasersmack

item.title: Episode 18, The hunt for Santa
item.description: Happy Santa hunting ya'll! Drink plenty of unicorn blood! Tell all your friends and pets that Liberty, Justice and the Persuit of Pizza makes funny. Also, tell them to listen in and listen up. They obviously need to hear what we're layin' down over here. Website: http://www.thew00tman.webs.com/ Email: Fadorakid@gmail.com Cracked.com: http://www.cracked.com/members/das_w00tman http://www.cracked.com/members/tasersmack
